Posts.Content: I don't know how to find a post from someone else. I would like to read this, but can't figure out how to find it. I found out Friday that I'm stage IV, with bone jets in two spots on my neck and one on my femur
Posts.Title: Met Breast cancer to the bones

Posts.Content: Mets. I wish they were jets. Lol
Posts.Title: Met Breast cancer to the bones

Posts.Content: I'm about to start taxol after trying taxotere with horrible side effects. I ended up in the hospital with severe diarrhea. My blood counts are very low now and I ended up so short of breath that I'm now on oxygen 24/7. If I have those side effects again, I will go off chemo and just do immunology drugs. I've only had one round of chemo, so I'm nervous about the next round. I was supposed to have infusions every three weeks, but had to delay another week to rwecover.
Posts.Title: Life on Taxol
